sections.MISSION: 3/2 Wolfpack conducts M4 Marskmanship training over TW9 (27NOV-01DEC) and TW10 (04-08DEC) within GTA range complex to increase individual Trooper lethality in key tactical skill level 1
sections.PURPOSE: of this operation is to maximize eligible Trooper participation in CONSKILLS course to increase lethality in combined arms maneuver. .
sections.KEY TASKS:
​
Develop and rehearse program of instruction for each CONSKILLS courses
Certify all instructors with Wolf 6 and 7
Maximize live fire and hands on training day and night
Develop new TTPs / SOPs across the Squadron ​
sections.END STATE: Eligible Wolfpack Troopers participate in at least 1x CONSKILLS course and all new SOPs are captured in Wolfpack TACSOP. ​
